description: Follow live text commentary, in-play clips, score updates and match stats from Dungannon Swifts vs Ballymena United in the Irish Premiership
title: Irish Premiership highlights: Sky Blues stun Swifts at Stangmore
title_page: Irish Premiership highlights: Sky Blues stun Swifts at Stangmore - BBC Sport
maintext:
Final whistle
A late strike gives Portadown victory over Carrick in the fourth and final Premiership game of the day.
Larne, Ballymena and Coleraine chalked up wins earlier on Saturday.
That's all from us for now but we're back tomorrow for the BetMcLean Cup final between Cliftonville and Glentoran.
Thanks for your company.
Post
Portadown 1-0 Carrick Rangers
The Portadown defence are caught sleeping by Jack Hastings, but he can't get a shot away before he is dispossessed.
This game has come to life in the last five minutes!
PENALTY APPEAL
Portadown 0-0 Carrick Rangers
Lee Chapman falls under the challenge of Luke O'Brien in the box and appeals for a penalty.
Referee Tony Clarke waves play on, to the frustration of the home fans.
Seconds later, Jack McIntyre makes a good save to deny Portadown the lead.
